name: Makeup Battle
description:
Welcome to Makeup Battle! Be careful, this game is too fun to stop playing!

Do you like parkour? Do you like makeup? Do you want to defeat your opponent to win? Or do you just want to swipe your phone to get happiness when you are bored? These are all available in Makeup Battle! Relaxing and exciting, with a lot of makeup, welcome to the most magical new sensation makeup parkour game of 2021! !

Game teaching:
· Find the makeup that best fits the theme in a limited time
·Go to the finish line and beat the opponent with the score

Features:
1. Easy operation with one hand
2. A variety of personalized makeup, a lot of interesting levels
3. Free to play, easy to get started
4. Easy and exciting, can bring you happiness at any time

What are you waiting for? Get ready to open Makeup Battle and have fun!
